name: Piss N' Shit: The Video Game Demo
name_original: Piss N' Shit: The Video Game Demo
description:
(NEW UPDATE VER.1.0.1)

  • Better control over character, the poop now moves faster and less "overweight"
  • Added an auto fire button (Use space and/or middle mouse button to use.)
  • Changed the invincibility frames so they actually show when you get hit now!
  • Added a pause menu for the Enter key. (will find a way to make an unpause button soon.)

Thank you for trying my game!

Follow me on Twitter - @ Nintend0m

I'm also on Instagram - @ Nintend0m2

IF YOU NOTICE ANY BUGS PLEASE LET ME KNOW IN THE COMMENTS AND MAYBE I CAN FIX THEM.

Credits:

BG Music - Fart Beat!? (ItsJerryAndHarry)

Game over song - Game Over Yeah - Sega Rally Championship

Bruh sound effect - self explanatory
